channel.title: Comments on: EI on the move

item.title: By: Paul Browne
item.dc:creator: Paul Browne
item.description:
If you donâ€™t know where that is, just head towards Howth.
I'd tend to describe it as either
'The back of the Point Depot (now 02 Arena)' or 'beside the (Port) end of the Port Tunnel' or 'near Clontarf Road Dart station'.
Paul
item.content:encoded:
If you donâ€™t know where that is, just head towards Howth.

I’d tend to describe it as either

‘The back of the Point Depot (now 02 Arena)’
or

or
